meanings.definition: Covered with a lot of hair.
meanings.sent1: The bear was the hairiest animal in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The dog with the hairiest coat won the competition.
meanings.sent3: The hairiest teddy bear at the fair was a big hit with the children.
meanings.sent4: Her hairiest nightmares always involved getting lost in a jungle of tangled vines.
meanings.sent5: The hairiest spider she had ever seen scurried across the floor, making her shiver.

meanings.sent1: The lion's mane was the hairiest of all the animals in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The yeti is often depicted as the hairiest creature in folklore.
meanings.sent3: The hairiest person in the family always had to use extra shampoo in the shower.
meanings.sent4: His hairiest moments were when he forgot to bring a hat on a cold winter day.
meanings.sent5: The hairiest rug in the house shed so much that it seemed to grow its own fur coat.
